name: Eye of Doooom
description:
You play as the eye of Doooom!  Your mission is to crush all opposing forces and destroy their homeworld!

Made for the Space Game Junkie's 10th Anniversary Jam

Assets used:

Pixel Space Background Generator by Deep-Fold: https://deep-fold.itch.io/space-background-generator

wills pixel explosion sample (aka Five Free Pixel Explosions)- https://untiedgames.itch.io/five-free-pixel-explosions

explosions-pack-web- https://ansimuz.itch.io/explosion-animations-pack

Warped Vehicles- https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-vehicles

Gravity font- https://jotson.itch.io/gravity-pixel-font

Laser Sprites- https://wenrexa.itch.io/laser2020

Pixel Planet Generator- https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator

Bfxr (used to generate SFX)- https://www.bfxr.net

GameLoops (BGM)- https://opengameart.org/content/royalty-free-game-music-loops

Pixelate Shader: https://godotshaders.com/shader/pixelate/

Created with the Godot game engine
